titles.title: A bill to accelerate the inclusion of the Medicare (Part A) trust fund among the social security trust funds removed from the unified budget of the United States Government.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Amends title VII (Administration) of the Social Security Act to include, beginning in FY 1989, the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund among the social security trust funds removed from the unified Federal budget. (Currently, such trust fund is not to be removed from the unified Federal budget until FY 1993.)
